title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 ยง 2371.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to set forth the methods and
procedures governing the availability and location for inspection and amendment
or correction of records of the Department of Taxation and Finance and the

State Tax Commission which are subject to the provisions of article 6-A of the

Public Officers Law, which is commonly referred to as the Personal Privacy

Protection Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
ยง
2371.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
